briefdescription.para: Creates a new scope which contains variables and functions relating to a QgsLayoutAtlas.

detaileddescription.para:
For instance, current page name and number.
atlas
source atlas. If null, a set of default atlas variables will be added to the scope.

briefdescription.para: Helper function for creating an expression context which contains just a feature and fields collection.

detaileddescription.para: Generally this method should not be used as the created context does not include standard scopes such as the global and project scopes.

briefdescription.para: Creates a new scope which contains functions and variables from the current attribute form/table feature.

detaileddescription.para:
The variables and values in this scope will reflect the current state of the form/row being edited. The formMode (SingleEditMode etc.) is passed as text
QGIS 3.2

briefdescription.para: Creates a list of three scopes: global, layer's project and layer.
Creates a new scope which contains variables and functions relating to the global QGIS context.

detaileddescription.para:
For instance, QGIS version numbers and variables specified through QGIS options.
setGlobalVariable()

briefdescription.para: Creates a new scope which contains variables and functions relating to a QgsMapLayer.

detaileddescription.para: For instance, layer name, id and fields.

briefdescription.para: Creates a new scope which contains variables and functions relating to a QgsLayoutItem.

detaileddescription.para:
For instance, item size and position.
setLayoutItemVariable()
setLayoutItemVariables()
QGIS 3.0

briefdescription.para: Creates a new scope which contains variables and functions relating to a QgsLayout layout.

detaileddescription.para:
For instance, number of pages and page sizes.
QGIS 3.0

briefdescription.para: Creates a new scope which contains variables and functions relating to a QgsMapSettings object.

detaileddescription.para: For instance, map scale and rotation.

briefdescription.para: Sets the expression context variables which are available for expressions triggered by a map tool capture like add feature.
Creates a new scope which contains variables and functions relating to provider notifications.
Creates a new scope which contains variables and functions relating to a processing algorithm, when used with the specified parameters and context.

detaileddescription.para: For instance, algorithm name and parameter functions.

briefdescription.para: Creates a new scope which contains variables and functions relating to a QGIS project.

detaileddescription.para:
For instance, project path and title, and variables specified through the project properties.
project
What project to use
setProjectVariable()

briefdescription.para: Registers all known core functions provided by QgsExpressionContextScope objects.
Remove a global context variable.
Remove project context variable.
Sets a global context variable.

detaileddescription.para:
This variable will be contained within scopes retrieved via globalScope().
name
variable name
value
variable value
setGlobalVariable()
globalScope()
removeGlobalVariable()

briefdescription.para: Sets all global context variables.

detaileddescription.para:
Existing global variables will be removed and replaced with the variables specified.
variables
new set of global variables
setGlobalVariable()
globalScope()
removeGlobalVariable()

briefdescription.para: Sets a layer context variable.

detaileddescription.para:
This variable will be contained within scopes retrieved via layerScope().
layer
map layer
name
variable name
value
variable value
setLayerVariables()
layerScope()

briefdescription.para: Sets all layer context variables.

detaileddescription.para:
Existing layer variables will be removed and replaced with the variables specified.
layer
map layer
variables
new set of layer variables
setLayerVariable()
layerScope()

briefdescription.para: Sets a layout item context variable, with the given name and value.

detaileddescription.para:
This variable will be contained within scopes retrieved via layoutItemScope().
setLayoutItemVariables()
layoutItemScope()
QGIS 3.0

briefdescription.para: Sets all layout item context variables for an item.

detaileddescription.para:
Existing variables will be removed and replaced with the variables specified.
setLayoutItemVariable()
layoutItemScope()
QGIS 3.0

briefdescription.para: Sets a layout context variable.

detaileddescription.para:
This variable will be contained within scopes retrieved via layoutScope().
layout
target layout
name
variable name
value
variable value
setLayoutVariables()
layoutScope()
QGIS 3.0

briefdescription.para: Sets all layout context variables.

detaileddescription.para:
Existing layout variables will be removed and replaced with the variables specified.
layout
target layout
variables
new set of layer variables
setLayoutVariable()
layoutScope()
QGIS 3.0

briefdescription.para: Sets a project context variable.

detaileddescription.para:
This variable will be contained within scopes retrieved via projectScope().
project
Project to apply changes to
name
variable name
value
variable value
setProjectVariables()
removeProjectVariable()
projectScope()

briefdescription.para: Sets all project context variables.

detaileddescription.para:
Existing project variables will be removed and replaced with the variables specified.
project
Project to apply changes to
variables
new set of project variables
setProjectVariable()
removeProjectVariable()
projectScope()

briefdescription.para: Updates a symbol scope related to a QgsSymbol to an expression context.

parameterdescription.para: pointer to an existing scope to update

briefdescription.para: Contains utilities for working with QgsExpressionContext objects, including methods for creating scopes for specific uses (e.g., project scopes, layer scopes).
